title: harihari raamaraama
sahitya:
hari hari rAma rAma nannaramara jUDagu niratamu nI nAma smaraNa Emaranu





anupallavi



 dasharatha nandana dashamukha mardana pashupati ranjana pApa vimOcana





caraNam



 maNimaya bhUSaNa manjuLa bhASaNa raNa jaya bhISaNa raghukula bhUSaNa

patita pAvana nAma bhadrAcaladAma satatamu shrI rAmadAsu nElumA
